name: Snakkle - Snake Puzzle
description:
It's a dangerous world for baby snakes! It's up to you and your logic solving skills to help these snakes grow up and escape their surroundings!

FEATURES:
Simple controls. Swipe to direct your Snake.
Nearly 200 exciting hand crafted puzzles to solve!
Collect all the snake skins!
Fun logic solving skills required!
Eat and grow to reach new areas!
Free to play!
Retro visuals!

Forget the classic style snake games, this is the exciting new way to slither in style!
